Package org.softsmithy.lib.persistence

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractEntity
    A mapped base class for JPA entities with reasonable defaults: A generated technical id (surrogate PK) of type Long with the generation strategy set to GenerationType.AUTO.
    ExtendedBaseDAO<T extends AbstractEntity>  
    GenericDAO<T,ID extends Serializable>  
    ResourceLocalTransactionController
